text: Thalassobacillus devorans is a Gram-positive, moderately halophilic and phenol-degrading bacterium from the genus of Thalassobacillus which has been isolated from saline sals from Spain. ==References== ==External links== *Type strain of Thalassobacillus devorans at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Bacillaceae Category:Bacteria described in 2005
title: Thalassobacillus devorans
